sources.title: Flying Cups and Saucers (1949)
sources.description: When two cats from the Moon, in search of mice, descend from the skies in a large flying object, resembling a cup-and-a-saucer, a furious fight results between the lunar-cats and the earth-mice. The mice also have to deal with a treacherous earth-dog who volunteers to reveal the hiding place of the mice. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/flying-cups-and-saucers-1949/

metadata.Plot: When two cats from the Moon, in search of mice, descend from the skies in a large flying object, resembling a cup-and-a-saucer, a furious fight results between the lunar-cats and the earth-mice. The mice also have to deal with a treacherous earth-dog who volunteers to reveal the hiding place of the mice.
metadata.Writer: Connie Rasinski, John Foster, Tom Morrison
